Header: Wanni Troops Listen to Lecture Organized by Psy Ops
Content: Directorate of Psychological Operations (Psy Ops) continuing with their educative projects had one more lecture, organized at the Security Force Headquarters - Wanni (SFHQ-W) on the topic 'Better family life through attitude development‚Äù on Saturday (7). Lieutenant Colonel B.G.S Samanthi conducted this lecture for more than 100 plus troops serving the Wanni.
